Name: Flax Engine - Tech Demo 2022
About the game: Flax Engine Tech Demo 2022 is a small demo application that showcases realistic scene rendering. New real-time Global Illumination rendering effect using DDGI algorithm simulates how the indirect light bounces through the world. This can be used in games and visualization products such as Arch Vis projects. Use the input Controls list to learn how to control the light direction and toggle custom options such as lights, GI, FPS counter, or dynamically simulated ball physics. Visit Flax Engine Website to learn more.
